original_name: What I'd Really Like to Do
plot: The BBC carried out a survey of the Great British public to find out what would be their dream job. In a series of ten programmes, presenter Adrian Chiles spends a day in each one of the top ten jobs as chosen by the public in the survey.
plot_en: The BBC carried out a survey of the Great British public to find out what would be their dream job. In a series of ten programmes, presenter Adrian Chiles spends a day in each one of the top ten jobs as chosen by the public in the survey.
plot_es: The BBC carried out a survey of the Great British public to find out what would be their dream job. In a series of ten programmes, presenter Adrian Chiles spends a day in each one of the top ten jobs as chosen by the public in the survey.
title: What I'd Really Like to Do
